description: Pathology reveals a grade 2 endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the uterus, 5.7 cm in size, with less than half myometrial invasion. Lymph nodes are negative, consistent with pT1a pN0 disease.
patient_notes: Your diagnosis is a type of uterine cancer that was confined to the inner muscle layer and did not spread to your lymph nodes. The tumor was completely removed with surgery. Current guidelines support close follow-up without additional treatment or, as an option, low-dose radiation to the vaginal area. We will discuss the best follow-up plan for you.

verification.assessment: FIGO and pathologic staging are accurately assigned as IA (pT1a, pN0, pM0).

cancer_organ_type.issues: Organ type should be exactly 'Uterus' as per provided organ types list, not 'Uterine cancer'.

change_explanations.cancer_organ_type: Changed from 'Uterine cancer' to 'Uterus'. Reason: Organ type should be exactly 'Uterus' as per provided organ types list, not 'Uterine cancer'.
